revised_title: A Comprehensive Study of Sea-Water Composition in Various Ocean Regions
tldr: The author investigates the composition of sea-water in different parts of the ocean, analyzing samples collected over a period of 20 years. The study reveals the presence of 27 elements in sea-water, including oxygen, hydrogen, chlorine, bromine, iodine, and fluorine. The author also discusses the role of marine organisms in the distribution and concentration of these elements.
